text: niscayanga, visvasincina varu (muslinlu) kani, (islanku purvapu) yudulu kani, kraistavulu kani, sabiyulu kani (evaraina sare)! Allah nu, antima dinanni visvasinci, satkaryalu cese variki, vari prabhuvu vadda manci pratiphalam untundi mariyu variki elanti bhayamu undadu mariyu varu duhkhapadaru kuda
